overview: Jason Harley stars as a gay-for-pay stripper discovering the ins and outs of stripping for men in a gay bar. On his first night, his friend Damon Phoenix teaches Jason the ropes about gay-for-pay. "The real money is in the back for private shows" instructs Damon. Jason decides to check it out and witnesses a four-way orgy starring hung C.J. Madison.
title: Bar Trade
